about_the_game:
UNDERDOG is a puzzle game with a dark story set in a city of wolves.
You play as a wolf who was betrayed, killed, and reanimated with an unquenchable hatred for the city.
Solve various puzzles, take revenge on your enemies, and face the end of the story.

GAMEPLAY

Eliminate all enemies on the map and be the last one standing to win.

Basic rules

1. Movement and Stamina
Player has health. Health decreases by 1 each time you move or are attacked, and reaches 0 when you die.
You can move up, down, left, and right, but once you move, you move in that direction without stopping until blocked by a wall or enemy.

2. Enemies Eat You
If you end your movement in an enemy's attack range, you are attacked and lose 1 health.
If there is an enemy within 1 space of you that has less health than you, you can eat it to remove it and regain that amount of health.

3. Watch the Pack
When a player spends the number of turns indicated in the UI, "Pack Watch" is activated.
When Pack Watch is activated, the wolf with the highest health among all wolves on the map is immediately executed and killed.
This includes players as well as enemies.

Gimmicks and boss stages

In addition to the basic rules, various gimmicks are introduced as the game progresses to keep the puzzles challenging and interesting.
And the boss stages at the end of each world offer puzzles against powerful enemies not seen in the regular stages.

Extra Stages

The basic stages in UNDERDOG are designed to allow players who are relatively new to puzzles to reach the ending without much difficulty.
However, for players who are more puzzle savvy and enjoy a challenge, we've included an extra stage in each world.
These extra stages aren't just for the sake of being challenging, they reward players for their efforts by allowing them to unlock special endings.
